潰.definition: (bound form) (of floodwaters) to break through a dam or dike; (bound form) to break through (a military encirclement); (bound form) to be routed; to be overrun; to fall to pieces; (bound form) to fester; to ulcerate

潰不成軍.definition: (of troops) to be utterly routed and dispersed

潰兵.definition: routed troops; defeated and dispersed troops

潰壩.definition: (of a dam) to be breached; to burst

潰敗.definition: to be utterly defeated; to be routed

潰散.definition: (of troops) to be routed and dispersed

潰決.definition: (of a dike or dam) to burst

潰膿.definition: (of a sore etc) to fester; to ulcerate
